headline.main: Postscripts on Middle West's Reactions to the War

lead_paragraph: A sheaf of letters received in a couple of days from places as far afield as Minnesota, Wisconsin, Ohio, Pennsylvania and points between prove how deeply interested the Midwest is in its own reactions to Europe and the war. Most of the correspondents agree that the mean temperature of their localities is not to be gauged by the heat of pro-war and anti-war groups.
